message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple way to begin.
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share
I'll offer you a slightly bigger share this time, but still a majority for me.
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority
I'll try to find a middle ground, but I'm not giving up yet.
I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking most of the pie
I'll try to make a more aggressive offer, but I'm still holding out for a better deal.
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm taking the majority
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still trying to hold out for a better deal.
I'll give you a tiny fraction, but I'm taking almost all the money
I'm running out of options, but I'm still trying to get a decent share.
I'll give you a tiny sliver, but I'm taking the majority
